pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, Capable of OpenGL 3.0+ Support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, Capable of OpenGL 3.0+ Support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
